A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The film is fun and full of incredible sci-fi moments but the lack of any narrative pay-off\, an unneeded subplot\, and an absolutely lazy third act makes the film a disappointment. It's a slap in the face to vested fans\, who were expecting a deeper exploration of franchise lore\, some measure of shock or gravitas\, or a more cohesive narrative. The Empire Strikes Back is several decades old yet still feels more original and memorable than this recent mess of a film.
